name: Remove Premium and NC Mall Tabs - Neopets
description:
Removes the Premium and NC Mall tabs on Neopets.
Centers and pads remaining navigation buttons to make up for empty space.
Could interfere with user profiles.

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.
